name: wundara
description: Neurodiversity-affirming learning platform for homeschool and classroom education

scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.db:setup: cd server && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:reset: cd server && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install

author: Wundara Team
